DEMO_TRICK_MODE.description: A tag that marks an asset as having a trick mode track, which allows a VCR-like effect when fast forwarding or rewinding.

DEMO_XLINK.description: A tag that marks an asset as containing one or more XLink.

DEMO_SUBTITLES.description: A tag that marks an asset as having subtitles.

DEMO_CAPTIONS.description: A tag that marks an asset as having closed captions.

DEMO_MULTIPLE_LANGUAGES.description: A tag that marks an asset as having multiple languages.

DEMO_AUDIO_ONLY.description: A tag that marks an asset as having multiple languages.

DEMO_OFFLINE.description: A tag that marks an asset as being possible to download.

DEMO_STORED.description: A tag that marks an asset as being downloaded by the user.

DEMO_MANIFEST_SEARCH.description: A header on a search field that filters by manifest type.

DEMO_CONTAINER_SEARCH.description: A header on a search field that filters by container type.

DEMO_DRM_SEARCH.description: A header on a search field that filters by whether or not the asset is protected by a Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_SOURCE_SEARCH.description: A header on a search field that filters by the source of the asset.

DEMO_LIVE.description: Text that describes an asset that is being broadcast live.

DEMO_WEBM.description: Text that describes an asset that uses the WebM container.

DEMO_MP4.description: Text that describes an asset that uses the MP4 container.

DEMO_MP2TS.description: Text that describes an asset that uses the MPEG-2 TS container.

DEMO_HIGH_DEFINITION.description: Text that describes an asset that has a high definition video stream.

DEMO_ULTRA_HIGH_DEFINITION.description: Text that describes an asset that has an ultra-high definition video stream.

DEMO_SURROUND.description: Text that describes an asset that has an a surround sound audio stream.

DEMO_DASH.description: Text that describes an asset that is packaged in a DASH manifest.

DEMO_HLS.description: Text that describes an asset that is packaged in an HLS manifest.

DEMO_WIDEVINE.description: Text that describes an asset that is protected with the Widevine Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_FAIRPLAY.description: Text that describes an asset that is protected with the Fairplay Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_CLEAR.description: Text that describes an asset that is not protected with any Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_CLEAR_KEY.description: Text that describes an asset that is protected with the Clear Key Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_PLAYREADY.description: Text that describes an asset that is protected with the Playready Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_UNKNOWN.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from an unknown source.

DEMO_CUSTOM.description: Text that describes an asset that was defined by the user.

DEMO_SHAKA.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Shaka Player asset library.

DEMO_AXINOM.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Axinom asset library.

DEMO_UNIFIED_STREAMING.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Unified Streaming asset library.

DEMO_DASH_IF.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Dash Industry Forum asset library.

DEMO_WOWZA.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Wowza asset library.

DEMO_BITCODIN.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Bitcodin asset library.

DEMO_NIMBLE_STREAMER.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Nimble Streamer asset library.

DEMO_AZURE_MEDIA_SERVICES.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Azure Media Services asset library.

DEMO_GPAC.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the GPAC project asset library.

DEMO_UPLYNK.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Verizon Digital Media Services asset library.

DEMO_APPLE.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Apple asset library.

DEMO_IRT.description: Text that describes an asset that comes from the Institut f√ºr Rundfunktechnik asset library.

DEMO_CONFIG.description: A title on the configuration panel, labeling it as configuration.

DEMO_HOME.description: A link in the header, that switches to a page configuration for viewing the curated set of front-page content.

DEMO_SEARCH.description: A link in the header, that switches to a page configuration for searching through the content library.

DEMO_CUSTOM_CONTENT.description: A link in the header, that switches to a page configuration for custom content.

DEMO_REPORT_BUG.description: A link in the header, that files a bug report.

DEMO_PROJECT_LINKS_HEADER.description: A header for a section of the footer, that contains links to various project-related things.

DEMO_DOCUMENTATION.description: A link in the footer, to the Shaka Player documentation.

DEMO_LICENSE.description: A link in the footer, to the Apache open-source license.

DEMO_SOURCE.description: A link in the footer, to the Shaka Player source on GitHub.

DEMO_NPM.description: A link in the footer, to the Nexus Package Manager page for Shaka Player.

DEMO_SUPPORT.description: A link in the footer, to a browser support test.

DEMO_CDN_HEADER.description: A header for a section of the footer, that contains links to various CDN (Content Delivery Network)-related things.

DEMO_LIBRARIES.description: A link in the footer, to Shaka Player in the Google Hosted Libraries CDN.

DEMO_JSDELIVR.description: A link in the footer, to Shaka Player in the jsDelivr CDN.

DEMO_CDNJS.description: A link in the footer, to Shaka Player in the CDNJS CDN.

DEMO_DEMO_MODE_HEADER.description: A header for a section of the footer, that allows the user to switch between different modes.

DEMO_COMPILED_RELEASE.description: A link in the footer, to the release build of the demo.

DEMO_COMPILED_DEBUG.description: A link in the footer, to the debug build of the demo.

DEMO_UNCOMPILED.description: A link in the footer, to the uncompiled build of the demo.

DEMO_PLAY.description: A button to play the attached asset.

DEMO_PROMPT_YES.description: A button to say 'yes' to a question (for example, DEMO_DELETE_CUSTOM_PROMPT).

DEMO_PROMPT_NO.description: A button to say 'no' to a question (for example, DEMO_DELETE_CUSTOM_PROMPT).

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_OFFLINE.message: Your browser does not support offline storage.
DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_OFFLINE.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the browser does not support storing things offline, in general.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_DISABLED.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the asset cannot be played on the browser, at all.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_DOWNLOAD.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the asset cannot be downloaded by any browser.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_KEY_SUPPORT.message: Your browser does not support the required key systems.
DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_KEY_SUPPORT.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the browser does not support the asset's Digital Rights Management system.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_LICENSE_SUPPORT.message: Your browser does not support offline licenses for the required key systems.
DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_LICENSE_SUPPORT.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the browser cannot store protected content offline.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_DASH_SUPPORT.message: Your browser does not support [PROPER_NAME:MPEG-DASH] manifests.
DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_DASH_SUPPORT.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the browser cannot play MPEG-DASH (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dynamic_Adaptive_Streaming_over_HTTP) content.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_HLS_SUPPORT.message: Your browser does not support [PROPER_NAME:HLS] manifests.
DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_HLS_SUPPORT.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the browser cannot play HLS (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_Live_Streaming) content.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_FORMAT_SUPPORT.message: Your browser does not support the required video format.
DEMO_UNSUPPORTED_NO_FORMAT_SUPPORT.description: An error message that shows why an asset cannot be stored offline: the browser cannot play that sort of video.

DEMO_UNSUPPORTED.description: A label that marks an asset as being unavailable, for some reason.

DEMO_DELETE_STORED_PROMPT.description: A prompt asking the user if they want to delete the offline copy of an asset.

DEMO_FRONT_INTRO_ONE.message: This is a demo of Google's [PROPER_NAME:Shaka Player], a JavaScript library for adaptive video streaming.
DEMO_FRONT_INTRO_ONE.description: The first part of a message introducing the demo to new users.

DEMO_FRONT_INTRO_TWO.message: Choose a video to playback; more assets are available via the search tab.
DEMO_FRONT_INTRO_TWO.description: The second part of a message introducing the demo to new users.

DEMO_FRONT_INTRO_DISMISS.description: A button allowing users to dismiss the intro message.

DEMO_MANIFEST_URL.description: The label on a field that allows users to provide a manifest URL for a custom asset.

DEMO_MANIFEST_URL_ERROR.description: An error that is displayed if the user does not provide a manifest URL for a custom asset.

DEMO_LICENSE_SERVER_URL.description: The label on a field that allows users to provide a license server for a custom asset.

DEMO_LICENSE_CERTIFICATE_URL.description: The label on a field that allows users to provide a license certificate for a custom asset.

DEMO_DRM_SYSTEM.description: The label on a field that allows users to provide a Digital Rights Management (DRM) system identifier for a custom asset.

DEMO_NAME.description: The label on a field that allows users to provide a name for a custom asset.

DEMO_NAME_ERROR.description: An error message that is displayed if the user presents an invalid name for a custom asset.

DEMO_ICON_URL.description: The label on a field that allows users to provide an icon for a custom asset.

DEMO_EDIT_CUSTOM.description: A button allowing users to edit a custom asset.

DEMO_DELETE_CUSTOM_PROMPT.description: A prompt asking the user to confirm if they want to delete a custom asset.

DEMO_DELETE_CUSTOM.description: A button allowing users to delete a custom asset.

DEMO_CUSTOM_INTRO_ONE.message: Try [PROPER_NAME:Shaka Player] with your own content!
DEMO_CUSTOM_INTRO_ONE.description: The first part of a message instructing users on how to add custom content.

DEMO_CUSTOM_INTRO_TWO.message: Press the button below to add a custom asset.
DEMO_CUSTOM_INTRO_TWO.description: The second part of a message instructing users on how to add custom content.

DEMO_CUSTOM_INTRO_THREE.message: Custom assets will remain even after reloading the page.
DEMO_CUSTOM_INTRO_THREE.description: The third part of a message instructing users on how to add custom content.

DEMO_UNDEFINED.description: Text describing a search term that the user has not set any desired value for.

DEMO_LIVE_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets that are live.
DEMO_LIVE_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_HIGH_DEFINITION_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets with at least one high-definition video stream.
DEMO_HIGH_DEFINITION_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_XLINK_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets that have [JARGON:XLINK] tags in their manifests, so that they can be broken into multiple files.
DEMO_XLINK_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_SUBTITLES_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets with caption tracks, or embedded captions.
DEMO_SUBTITLES_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_TRICK_MODE_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets that have special video tracks to be used in [JARGON:trick mode] playback (aka fast-forward).
DEMO_TRICK_MODE_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_SURROUND_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets with at least one surround sound audio track.
DEMO_SURROUND_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_OFFLINE_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets that can be stored offline.
DEMO_OFFLINE_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_STORED_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets that have been stored offline.
DEMO_STORED_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_AUDIO_ONLY_SEARCH.message: Filters for assets that do not have video streams.
DEMO_AUDIO_ONLY_SEARCH.description: A tooltip for an optional search term.

DEMO_DELAY_LICENSE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_VIDEO_ROBUSTNESS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_AUDIO_ROBUSTNESS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_IGNORE_DASH_DRM.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_AUTO_CORRECT_DASH_DRIFT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_XLINK_FAIL_GRACEFULLY.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_IGNORE_DASH_SUGGESTED_PRESENTATION_.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_IGNORE_HLS_TEXT_FAILURES.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_AVAILABILITY_WINDOW_OVERRIDE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_CLOCK_SYNC_URI.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_IGNORE_DRM.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_DEFAULT_PRESENTATION_DELAY.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_IGNORE_MIN_BUFFER_TIME.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_INITIAL_SEGMENT_LIMIT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_DISABLE_AUDIO.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_DISABLE_VIDEO.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_DISABLE_TEXT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_ENABLED.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BANDWIDTH_ESTIMATE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BANDWIDTH_DOWNGRADE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BANDWIDTH_UPGRADE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_SWITCH_INTERVAL.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MIN_WIDTH.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MAX_WIDTH.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MIN_HEIGHT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MAX_HEIGHT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MIN_PIXELS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MAX_PIXELS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MIN_BANDWIDTH.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MAX_BANDWIDTH.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MAX_ATTEMPTS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BASE_DELAY.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BACKOFF_FACTOR.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_FUZZ_FACTOR.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_TIMEOUT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_USE_PERSISTENT_LICENSES.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_MAX_SMALL_GAP_SIZE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BUFFERING_GOAL.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_DURATION_BACKOFF.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_REBUFFERING_GOAL.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_BUFFER_BEHIND.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_SAFE_SEEK_OFFSET.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_STALL_THRESHOLD.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_SAFE_SKIP_DISTANCE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_ALWAYS_STREAM_TEXT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_ALWAYS_STREAM_TEXT_WARNING.message: Text must always be streamed while native controls are enabled, for captions to work.
DEMO_ALWAYS_STREAM_TEXT_WARNING.description: A tooltip that warns the user that a certain combination of config values cannot be picked.

DEMO_JUMP_LARGE_GAPS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_FORCE_TRANSMUX_TS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_START_AT_SEGMENT_BOUNDARY.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_IGNORE_TEXT_FAILURES.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_STALL_DETECTOR_ENABLED.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_USE_NATIVE_HLS_SAFARI.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_AUDIO_LANGUAGE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_TEXT_LANGUAGE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_UI_LOCALE.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_AUDIO_CHANNEL_COUNT.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_SHAKA_CONTROLS.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_LOG_LEVEL.description: The name of a configuration value.

DEMO_LOG_LEVEL_INFO.description: The name of a log level, describing how detailed logging should be.

DEMO_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG.description: The name of a log level, describing how detailed logging should be.

DEMO_LOG_LEVEL_V.description: The name of a log level, describing how detailed logging should be.

DEMO_LOG_LEVEL_VV.description: The name of a log level, describing how detailed logging should be.

DEMO_DRM_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_MANIFEST_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_ADAPTATION_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_OFFLINE_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_STREAMING_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_LANGUAGE_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_RESTRICTIONS_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_ADAPTATION_RESTRICTIONS_SECTION_HEA.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_DRM_RETRY_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_MANIFEST_RETRY_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_STREAMING_RETRY_SECTION_HEADER.description: The header for a section of configuration values.

DEMO_NUMBER_DECIMAL_WARNING.description: A warning on number inputs, telling the user what the expected input format is.

DEMO_NUMBER_INTEGER_WARNING.description: A warning on number inputs, telling the user what the expected input format is.

DEMO_NUMBER_NONZERO_DECIMAL_WARNING.message: Must be a positive, nonzero number.
DEMO_NUMBER_NONZERO_DECIMAL_WARNING.description: A warning on number inputs, telling the user what the expected input format is.

DEMO_NUMBER_NONZERO_INTEGER_WARNING.message: Must be a positive, nonzero integer.
DEMO_NUMBER_NONZERO_INTEGER_WARNING.description: A warning on number inputs, telling the user what the expected input format is.
